alert.note: Alert for Harding; Quay (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 8:54PM MDT until June 22 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Harding County in northeastern New Mexico... Northeastern Quay County in east central New Mexico... * Until 930 PM MDT. * At 853 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Logan, or 18 miles southwest of Nara Visa, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 840 PM MDT trained weather spotters reported hail up to the size of half dollars north of Logan, New Mexico. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Logan. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
